resources.string: Book has been added and assigned to your account
Book already added. Go find it!
Book has been added, but not assigned
The first time you read this book!
The password must be at least 6 characters long
Please enter the email address of the account to which you want to reset the password
Email with password reset link has been sent
The account with the specified email address does not exist
Number of pages and year of publication have to be a number
The last page read must be smaller than all the pages of the book!
The book rating must be greater than 0!
Do you want to read or rate that book again?
You are reading this book one more time
You are just now reading this book
Please enter your new username and password
Please enter your new email and password
Please enter your new password and old password
You haven\'t read any books yet!
You are reading all the books from our base!
Would you like to read this book?
Daro the Lion as King would love to reign in your library
Dog Simon is a faithful companion who will keep you company while you read
Maciek the cat is a cutie who likes it when someone scratches his back while reading
Piggy Patrick prefers only a good book (preferably with you) to his delicious snacks
Shark Alexander is a gentle predator, the only thing he devours is a few dozen pages before bedtime
Laura the cow, despite her chronic mooing, can focus on the plot of any book
Konrad the Sloth\'s favorite thing surprisingly is not sleeping, but lazing around with a book
Radek the Fox is a little prankster, so you\'d better keep an eye on your books, because he might hide them
Turtle Iga may be slow moving, but no one reads books faster than she does
Crocodile Claudius, despite his crocodile duties, will always find time to read with you
Do you want this pet to be your companion?
From now on Daro the Lion is your pet!
From now on Maciek the Cat is your pet!
From now on, Simon the Dog is your pet!
From now on, Patrick the Pig is your pet!
From now on, Alexander the Shark is your pet!
From now on, Laura the Cow is your pet!
From now on, Konrad the Sloth is your pet!
From now on, Radek the Fox is your pet!
From now on, Iga the Turtle is your pet!
From now on, Crocodile Claudius is your pet!
Whoaa!!! Stop poking me because I\'m reading!
How do you feel today? How much did you read today? Shall we play later?
What is about? I have already read mine today, let me take a nap....
Ey, be a little careful when reading! By the way, do you have any snacks with you?
Howdy! Glad to see you here! Stay a while and read something with me!
Moo! Oh sorry... Moo! My chronic mooing... Moo! Gives me a hard time... Moo!
What?! Oo it\'s you.... Thanks for waking me up, because it\'s high time to read something!
Aaah, what is you! Damn! I almost managed to hide your books!
Hello friend. I just finished reading a 1000-page book about pizza and a craving for it came over me. Would you like a slice?
O! Sorry, I think I ran into you. I just found a super book and am going to read it. You look for it too!
Â Whoa! It\'s me Daro the Lion! Remember to read today!
Hey it\'s me Simon! Come play with me and then read!
It\'s me Maciek! I just got up to remind you to read today! Well, I\'m going back to sleep....
Hey it is me Patrick! Listen, leave the food for me, and you go read!
Howdy, Alexander here! Listen, take a short break and grab a book!
Moo! It\'s me Laura... Moo! Sorry for mooing, but... Moo! Please read today!
Hey here Konrad the Sloth! I hold a place for you to laze around with a book.
Hey! Radek here, remember to keep a good eye on your books!
Hello, it\'s me Turtle Iga. Let\'s go reading together! If you want, I can read slower so that you can keep up!
Hello! Claudius Crocodile here. Let\'s read together, then our knowledge will increase!
Select the time at which you want to receive the reminder
